panels.description: The current number of nodes in the cluster.
panels.title: Number of nodes

panels.description: Current uptime status of the kube apiservers.
panels.title: API Servers UP

panels.description: Current uptime status of the kube controller managers.
panels.title: Kube Controller Managers UP

panels.description: Current uptime status of the kube schedulers.
panels.title: Schedulers UP

panels.description: Current kube-apiservers error request rate.
panels.title: API Server Request Error Rate

panels.description:
Checks the connection to the API Server from the seed and from the shoot (via loadbalancer).

0 = down; 1 = up
panels.title: API Server Connectivity

panels.description: Shows the CPU usage of the Kube API Server and shows the requests and limits.
panels.title: Kube API Server CPU usage

panels.description: Shows the memory usage of the Kube API Server.
panels.title: Kube API Server Memory Usage

panels.description: Shows the rate of all API server requests and the error rate of API server requests. Requests are the average rate of requests received in the past 5 minutes.
panels.title: API Server Request Rates

panels.description: Shows the request latency of each verb for the API server.
panels.title: API Server Request Latency

panels.description: Shows the size of the ETCD DB
panels.title: Etcd DB Size

panels.description: Shows the number of API Resources that are in the cluster.
panels.title: API Resources

panels.description:
Count of registered API Server watches split by watched resources. 

High number of watches can lead to performance issues of the API Server and the underlying ETCD.

Note: **group** is a reference for the default k8s api group.
panels.title: API Server Watches

panels.description: Shows the CPU usage of the kube-controller-manager and shows the requests and limits.
panels.title: Kube-controller-manager CPU usage

panels.description: Shows the memory usage of the kube-controller-manager.
panels.title: Kube-controller-manager Memory Usage

panels.description: The average http request rate of the last 5m executed by the Kube Controller Manager to the cluster API server. The request are split by their response status codes.
panels.title: Request Rate to Kube API

panels.description: Shows the CPU usage of the kube-scheduler and shows the requests and limits.
panels.title: Kube-scheduler CPU usage

panels.description: Shows the memory usage of the kube-scheduler.
panels.title: Kube-scheduler Memory Usage

panels.description: Shows the 50th, 90th and 99th latency percentile for scheduling in the cluster.
panels.title: End to End Scheduling Latency Percentile

panels.description: The average http request rate of the last 5m executed by the Kube Scheduler to the cluster API server. The request are split by their response status codes.
panels.title: Request Rate to Kube API
